# zenduty_teams 

```hcl

data "zenduty_teams" "exampleteams" {
  
}

```

or 

```hcl

data "zenduty_teams" "exampleteams" {
  team_id = ""
}

```

```hcl

output "teams" {
  value = data.zenduty_teams.exampleteams.teams
}

```


<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Argument Reference

* `team_id`(Optional) - The UniqueID of the team to query.
### Optional

- **team_id** (String)
